name: Digital Management Trainee (corporate digital)
description:
For creative and ambitious entrepreneurs driven by passion for business only.

L’Oréal Management Trainee Program is 12 months of full time employee responsibilities and a chance to become a junior specialist in brand or digital marketing. We have over 27 famous brands in Russia that are looking for future business disrupters to be a part of product launches, digital activations and market analysis. Expect to manage your own projects and present your own insights and results to our senior management.

You will have three rotations in corporate digital.

Your Background:

  • not less than 6 month of internship or working experience in digital/analytics
  • Fluent English
  • Ready to work full-time
  • Bachelor's degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g., Statistics, Computer Science, Math, Physics, Engineering), or equivalent practical experience.
  • Experience with scripting languages (e.g., Python, JavaScript, etc.) and manipulating data sets in SQL.
  • Proficiency in Excel (Macros creation experience, formulas usage etc.),
  • Experience with Google Analytics, SimilarWeb,
  • Passion for quantitative analysis, forecasting for user behavior,
  • Experience building and automating reporting dashboards, as well as compiling C-level presentations.
  • Ability to translate business problems into analysis frameworks and translate analysis results back into business recommendations.
  • Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment with effective time-management and prioritization skills.
  • Comfortable presenting to audiences of various levels and backgrounds (commercial/technical).

Our Commitment:

  • An inspiring challenge within the n.1 Cosmetic Company in the world
  • Personal integration & development program
  • Official legal conditions for 12 months
  • Competitive salary
  • Free lunches in the office
  • Health & Life insuarance
  • Partial compentaion for the gym
  • Cool office in the city center
  • Further career opportunities

This 12-month program is an exclusive path for young talents to be considered for L’Oréal’s full-time position such as Junior Brand Manager or Digital Executive Specialist.
